document.full_text: actress marlee matlin says she is selling her los angeles-area house and taking her four children out of private school to ease a cash crunch that has left her owing $50,000 in back taxes.
document.title: marlee matlin selling home after being hit with tax bill
lines_and_colors: actress marlee matlin says she is selling her los angeles-area house and taking her four children out of private school to ease a cash crunch that has left her owing $50,000 in back taxes.
